title: Style Style Thaan Lyrics Baasha
stanzas:
Style Style Thaan Song Lyrics #Baasha
#SPB #KSChithra #Deva # Vairamuthu

Style-u style-u thaan
idhu super style-u thaan
un style-u ketha mayilu
naanuthaan (2)

oh touchu touchu
touchu touchu enna
touchu ne

oh kichu kichu
kichu kichu enna
kichu ne

yaezhu manikku maela
naanum inba latchumi

Figure-u figure-u thaan
nee super figure-u thaan
indha figure-u kaetha
minor naanuthaan(2)

ah touchu touchu
touchu touchu enna
touchu me

ah kichu kichu
kichu kichu enna
kichu me

yaezhu manikku maela
neeyum inba latchumi

Style-u style-u thaan
idhu super style-u thaan
un style-u ketha mayilu
naanuthaan

kadhalicha kavidhai varum
kandukonden pennaale.
karuppum or azhagu
kandukonden unnaale.

enengae shock adikkum
arindhu konden pennaale.
engengae thael kadikkum
therindhu konden unnaale.

kashmir rojave
kaiku vandhaaye
mondhu paakkumunne
mulleduthu kuththaadhe

azhagu rajave
avasaram aagaathe
mottu malarum munne
mutti mutti suthaathe.

adi raathiri varave
en ragasiya selave
oru kaathadichadhu
serthanaikkanum
kaathiru nilave.

Style-u style-u thaan
idhu super style-u thaan
un style-u ketha mayilu
naanuthaan

Figure-u figure-u thaan
nee super figure-u thaan
indha figure-u kaetha
minor naanuthaan

pachcharisi pallazhagaa
pal sirippil kolladhe
azhagumani thaerazhagi
asaiyavitte kollaathe

netri thodum
mudi azhagaa
ottrai mudi thaaraayo

kaththai malar
kuzhal azhagi
oththai malar thaarayo

ange theendaathe
aasai thoondaathe
summa kendantha
sangai oodhi vittu pogathe

oodal kollaathe
ullam thaangaathe
thalaivi kaaichal kondaal
thalaiyanaiyum thoongaathe

ada kettadhu manasu
vandhu muttudhu vayasu
unnai partha pozhudhu
vertha pengalil
nana oru dhinusu.

Style-u style-u thaan
idhu super style-u thaan
un style-u ketha mayilu
naanuthaan

Figure-u figure-u thaan
nee super figure-u thaan
indha figure-u kaetha
minor naanuthaan

oh touchu touchu
touchu touchu enna
touchu ne

ah kichu kichu
kichu kichu enna
kichu me

yaezhu manikku maela
naanum inba latchumi

Style-u style-u thaan
idhu super style-u thaan
un style-u ketha mayilu
naanuthaan
varave va.

Figure-u figure-u thaan
nee super figure-u thaan
indha figure-u kaetha
minor naanuthaan
